segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, the woman's tending to the dishes by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water's running over, creating a sad little flood on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, drying that plate without knowing the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good, the boy on the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies, but it looks dangerous, and that worries me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below is expectant, hand out, sharing in the naughtiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is beautiful, yet inside feels so fraught with issues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the mom; she'll be upset when she discovers this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink could damage so much, it's depressing to think about.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids might get hurt, and no one's watching out for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm outside makes the indoor neglect even more poignant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame how everyday moments can hide these potential heartbreaks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before anything goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the innocence of the scene tugs at my heartstrings.
segments.speaker: PAR
